## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (95c80c0310b0e699eca912fbabda41f503177193a10244ff4ceeecee8706a39f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ufarm-evm-contracts' @ 100.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
